pkgmetadata.longdescription: Statistical Trending for Medical Devices Surveillance // A collection of common statistical algorithms used in active surveillance of medical device events. Context includes post- market surveillance, pharmacovigilance, signal detection and trending, and regulatory reporting. Primary inputs are device- event time series. Outputs include trending results with the ability to run multiple algorithms at once. This package works well with the 'mds' package, but does not require it.
